HEADERS.COMMUNITY: Join the LoFi Community of Greece

CONTENT.COMMUNITY: For events, music and networking, become a member of the Greek Lofi Community Discord Server and you'll stay up to date on everything!
CONTENT.VIDEO: Watch the official dance video for "Marigold" by Lys
CONTENT.RELEASE-1: You can now Listen to the 1sr official LoFi Hip-Hop album of the Greek Lofi Community made by 12 artists of Greece.
CONTENT.RELEASE-2: You can now Listen to the 2nd official LoFi Hip-Hop album of the Greek Lofi Community made by 9 artists of Greece.
CONTENT.RADIO: The goal of the Greek Lofi Community is to strengthen the lofi scene in Greece. That's why we have our own Lofi Radio.

CONTENT.LABEL: The Lofi.gr record label promotes Lofi artists from Greece through its album releases. You can now listen to our first 2 albums on the platform of your choice.
CONTENT.VIDEO-1: Listen to 'Marigold' by Lys. A part of 'Aphrodite's Memories'

CONTENT.ARTISTS: The Lofi.gr Community you can find 15+ Lofi beatmakers from Greece. In the list below you can listen to their music.
CONTENT.RANDOM: The order of the artist list is randomised

CONTENT.LABEL: The Greek Lofi Community often works together to publish content under the banner of the Lofi.gr record label. If you are Greek, Cypriot or an expat living in Greece and you want to publish music with our record label, feel free to join our discord server where we talk about new collaborations.
CONTENT.TEAM: The management team of LoFi.gr is a subset of the entire Greek LoFi community and it deals with issues relating to the Lofi.gr label, content production, curration, event organization, promotion, web application development and maintenance of online servers for the Greek LoFi Radio. Do you think that you can offer something special to our team?
CONTENT.DISCORD: Join the official Discord of the Greek Lofi Community.
CONTENT.DEFINITION: Lofi is a type of music that combines hip-hop and chill-out elements. It has its roots in Boom-Bap (hip hop music production style of the 90s), jazz and electronic music while the name Lo-Fi, LoFi or Low Fidelity refers to the sounds of vinyl and beatmakers samples that often aim to evoke feelings of relaxation and nostalgia in the listener. Lo-Fi began to be recognized as a distinct style of music in the 1990s but gained particular popularity in early 2017.

CONTENT.CORPORATE: Lofi.gr works in partnership with Inhinito which was founded to support creators through an ecosystem of specialized talent agencies, workspaces and software tools that make it easier to create projects, collaborate and reach a target audience.
